In 250 words or less: In your own words - describe the concept and mechanisms used in inheritance
Write a program that exemplifies the concept of inheritance.
Comment the pro-gram accordingly to describe your example. You should use real-life concepts as classes in the program.
Write a program that reads a file with n number of strings separated by linebreaks.
The program determines and prints how many words are in the file.
